entry.def: An undergraduate is a student at a university or college who is studying for his or her first degree.

example.ex: Economics undergraduates are probably the brightest in the university.
example.tran: 经济学专业的本科生可能是大学里最聪明的学生。

means.word_mean: 1. a university student who has not yet received a first degree

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生
stems_affixes.word_buile: under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
under在……下+line线→在字底下划线,引申为强调

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承担, 担任, 许诺, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+take拿→在下面拿→承担, 担任

stems_affixes.value_cn: 签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+write写→v.签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
under不足,不够+play玩→没玩够→说得不够的

Sentence.sentence: The company just released an updated version last week, and it'll be utilized in over 50 undergraduate and graduate classrooms this coming school year.
One of the great things about freshman housing is that, with some exceptions, the process throws you together randomly," said Undergraduate Assembly chairman Alec Webley.
Only a small number of undergraduates will continue in an academic career.

The Three-Year Solution Hartwick College, a small liberal-arts school in upstate New York, makes New York, makes this offer to well prepared students: earn your undergraduate degree in three years instead of four, and save about 543,000—the amount of one year's tuition and fees

The average amount of time students now take to complete an undergraduate degree has stretched to six years and seven months as students interrupted by work, inconvenienced by unavailable classes, or lured by one more football season find it hard to graduate
Changes at the high-school level are also helping to make it easier for many students to earn their undergraduate degrees in less time.
